statements: DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 50;
DELETE FROM WeatherData WHERE id = 1 AND temperature > 25.0;
DELETE FROM SolarPowerGeneration WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND power_generation < 100.0;
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50
DELETE FROM WeatherForecast WHERE city = 'New York' AND date = '2022-08-15'
DELETE FROM WeatherForecast WHERE city = 'New York' AND date = '2022-06-15';
DELETE FROM SolarPowerConsumption WHERE date = '2022-07-25' AND power_consumption < 500;
